summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackFresh's Sugar Strawberry Exfoliating Face Wash is a gentle exfoliating face cleanser that removes impurities and excess oil-without drying-while refining the look of pores for smooth, soft skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsExfoliates and cleanses-all in oneGently refines skin texture with melting sugarMaintains skin's moisture for a supple, smooth finishKey IngredientsA customized blend of white sugar crystals helps to smooth and soften the skin.Strawberry and black currant fruit extracts help to maintain a healthy-looking complexion.Grapeseed oil helps to maintain hydration.Soap berry peel extract helps to gently cleanse.Research Results100% agreed their skin is smooth & soft after 1 use*97% said it refined their skin's texture after 1 use*98% agreed it removed impurities that congest pores*95% felt it cleansed & polished skin without stripping moisture*Scientifically proven to preserve skin's moisture for 6 hours***self-assessment, 60 subjects, 4 weeks**instrumental test, 32 subjectsItem 2617060How To UseApply to damp skin and massage with warm water until the sugar dissolves, then rinse. Customize your level of exfoliation by using less water for a stronger scrub or more water for a gentler exfoliation. Mild enough to be used daily.IngredientsGlycerin, Sucrose, Butylene Glycol, Fragaria Ananassa (strawberry) Fruit Juice, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Ribes Nigrum (black Currant) Fruit Extract, Zea Mays (corn) Starch, Vitis Vinifera (grape) Seed Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Tocopherol, Parfum (fragrance), Carbomer, Aqua (water), Sodium Hydroxide, Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool \<19371\>.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to damp skin and massage with warm water until the sugar dissolves, then rinse. Customize your level of exfoliation by using less water for a stronger scrub or more water for a gentler exfoliation. Mild enough to be used daily.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff!
reviews.comments: My skin feels amazing everytime I use this amd the smell is yummy

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: I bought this when it was on sale because the reviews are great and I was looking for a good exfoliating cleanser. The positives are that it is cleansing and it smells good. The downside is that it really doesn't exfoliate which was the main reason for my purchase. There are much better exfoliating cleansers on the market at comparable prices.

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: it smells so so good and has never broken out my dry skin. i feel like its not a lofe changing product but my skin always feels soft afterwards.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I use this in the morning in the shower.  I am makeup free.  I like it as it exfoliates; however, it is gentle.  I like that this product now comes in a tube.  It use to come in a glass jar which I did not like in the shower.

reviews.headline: Nice product
reviews.comments: Great smelling and the scrub was just right.  Most scrubs you can barely feel, but this one was just right.  It's not as drying as most scrubs.

reviews.headline: Love It!
reviews.comments: To get the full benefit of this delicate scrub be careful not to use with too much water. It smells lovely and works quite well. Having used for 3 months, my 60 year old skin is smooth and silky with less visable pores.

reviews.headline: yummy!
reviews.comments: Smells so good, feels gentle on the face, which I like. bonus, it seems to warm up when I first apply it to my skin!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I loved it! My skin is so dry just by itself so using this product was so nice just because it's so gentle and not to rough on my skin!

reviews.headline: Best Natural Exfoliant
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! I read some of the other reviews, and I definietly disagree. I have sensitive dry skin, but this stuff works beautifully! It is all natural and has improved my skin tone and texture over time. I use this once a day, and its made a huge differnce. It does have a scent, but its natural, and not artificial. I dont mind the smell. It's personal preference I guess. If youre looking for a natural exfolient that wont destroy your skins barrier, this is it!

reviews.headline: too gentle
reviews.comments:
I didn't find this to have enough scrub. You could feel some grain in the product when you squeezed it out, but once I started to apply to my face, what little sugar scrub just dissolved. 
This product would be better for someone who wants a very light scrub (and isn't allergic to strawberries) Unfortunately for me, I want to feel the grains and get a high grit to scrub my face. If you're like me, then this product is not for you.

Therefore this product does what it advertised: a gentle scrub.

reviews.headline: Great, Have been using for years
reviews.comments: Love how lightly exfoliating this is. It smells like strawberry jam. It also lightly moisturizing after washing off and has a gel-like consistency. I have been using it for years with never an issue, especially for my sensitive allergy prone skin. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: The smell is so chemically, and its so rough on my skin. I have more sensitive skin and this tore my skin up.

reviews.headline: Good Face Wash
reviews.comments: I like this face wash. It is gently exfoliating, leaving skin feeling soft, clean, and nourished. It does not have a fragrance, so it does not smell like anything. It's a good daily face wash.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love this as a gentle exfoliate, it's amazing and smells so good! My only complaint is of you have too much water on your face or hands it just melts away.

reviews.headline: This product is amazing
reviews.comments: I will definitely buy again

reviews.headline: It's a staple
reviews.comments: I have been using fresh products as a teen and am happy they are easier to find now on here. I have oily, period prone acne, seasonal skin. This is my go to for when I need to go from a creamer exfoliating cleanser to a more gel like. I love how it is not to exfoliating, just enough, a wash, and leaves my skin moisturized. It's my staple from spring-fall.

reviews.headline: Daughter hooked me on this exfoliating product
reviews.comments: The scent, the feel of deep cleansing my skin and the actual work of this product makes me continue purchasing it.

reviews.headline: Smooth, gentle, sweet!
reviews.comments: Fresh Soy Cleanser companionâ€”-Exfoliates without harsh acids or grit, the natural oils hydrate & smell so sweet, a dose of euphoria for the day! If you are looking for a face and body exfoliant that checks off all the boxes, this it the one.  Hight five  *****

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I was looking for a face scrub and an employee recommended this one so I decided to try it. It is amazing! Leaves your face so smooth and smells great!

reviews.headline: Shock
reviews.comments:
I bought this a couple of months ago and loved it. My skin is very sensitive and red, so I was pleasantly surprised when it cleaned my face without drying it out and left a nice glow to it. 
I wanted to repurchase but the price doubled!?! I'm broke now so I'll just go cry..

faceoff_positive.comments: This cleanser is one of my favorites! I look forward to using it. It gently exfoliates the skin, leaving it clean, bright and very soft. I love the warm scent, and how it leaves my skin all pampered and healthy.
faceoff_positive.headline: A Favorite.

faceoff_negative.comments: I am so sad about this product! I read great things but unfortunately it broke me out terribly the first time I used it. I thought it was maybe just a coincidence so I removed it from my regimine and waited for my skin to clear up. I then reintroduced it and it broke me out again, the morning after I used it! Very unfortunate as it is not the most affordable product
faceoff_negative.headline: Disappointed :(
